title: Winesburg, Ohio
description: Winesburg, Ohio, written when Sherwood Anderson was forty, was the book in which he achieved the freshness and rightness of an author who, for the first time, is touching his highest mark. A unified collection of short stores, it lays bare the life of a small town in the American Midwest. Through the years it has come to be regarded as the best of Anderson's works.
author: Sherwood Anderson
